titles.title: An original bill to amend the Nuclear Waste Policy Act of 1982 with respect to the Office of Nuclear Waste Negotiator and the Monitored Retrievable Storage Commission.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Johnston. With written report No. 100-517.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 950.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.

vote.text: Passed House by Yea-Nay Vote: 419 - 0 (Record Vote No: 411).

bill.summary: 9/16/1988--Introduced. Amends the Nuclear Waste Policy Act of 1982 to establish the Office of the Nuclear Waste Negotiator as an independent establishment in the executive branch. (Currently such office is part of the Executive Office of the President.) Extends from June 1, 1989, to November 1, 1989, the deadline by which the Monitored Retrievable Storage Commission must report to the Congress regarding the need for a monitored retrievable storage facility as part of a national nuclear waste management system.
